name: The Legend Of The Revenant Demo
name_original: The Legend Of The Revenant Demo
description:
This is a demo. The full game is still a work in progress.

Death. It is a natural occurrence. Everyone will experience it at one point. What happens after that, however, is a mystery. Maybe an afterlife awaits us. Maybe there are a plethora of Gods that await us. Maybe it is just a inky black void of nothingness.

Well, this game shows us what lies after. Dive in to the story of a young unnamed girl, one who has recently died. She is to discover what lies after death. She is sent to the Lost Realm, a dimension where the souls of the dead are sent. Here, she is assigned the role of a Revenant, a soul that is sent to the Material Plane to do the Lady of The Lost Realm's bidding. Will she be ready to take on the role of a Revenant? What will she do? What kind of hi jinks and shenanigans will she be caught up in?  Maybe she'll have to slay a party of Soul Shredders. Maybe stop an arcane cultist from bringing the destruction of Earth. Who knows what she'll have to do, but remember: Revenants are only sent out if something MAJOR is happening, so whatever it is, it will be AMAZING!
